pr_title: EQL: Improve query folder test suite

timeline.message: EQL: Improve query folder test suite
Refactor tests, change to substring match asserts per today's conversation
Remove a couple of extra empty lines
Remove a couple of extra empty lines
Update QueryFolderOkTests for the latest master changes

timeline.bodyText: This error message is confusing to the end user: there is no equality comparison in the query... I'm not saying the test is incorrect, but the way we report the error in the context of EQL is slightly incorrect.
timeline.author: astefan

replies.bodyText: I agree - to improve the message one could either look and check whether it's the first comparison (which might not work if any is added) or check whether the comparison is added against the event_type field and if so, mention that in the error message (e.g. offender eventy.category`).
replies.author: costin

replies.bodyText: Will open a separate issue for the error message per conversation with Costin.
replies.author: aleksmaus
